rules_text:
Multikicker {2} [i](You may pay an additional {2} any number of times as you cast this spell.)[/i]
Choose one, then choose another for each time Clairvoyant Coercion was kicked –
• Gain control of up to two target creatures until end of turn.
• Untap up to two target creatures.
• Up to two target creatures get +1/+0 and gain haste until end of turn.
